CustomField.description: BODEV-1692 (formula updated): Checkbox for calculating how often we are speaking with Prospects. Tasks are created from SalesLoft/Drift/etc.
CustomField.formula: CONTAINS(Subject, "Reply") || CONTAINS(Subject, "Conversation in Drift") || CONTAINS(Subject, "Default personal meeting") || CONTAINS(Subject, "Call: connected") || CONTAINS(Subject, "Meeting booked with Drift") || CONTAINS(Subject, "Discovery call") || CONTAINS(Subject, "Disco call") || CONTAINS(Subject, "Chorus -") || CONTAINS(Subject, "Demo") || CONTAINS(Subject, "Zoom call")
CustomField.label: Connected
